dmca.title: Casino Vacations complains of copying
dmca.body:
Gentlemen:

Following is a notice of copyright infringement.

1.	The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.americancasionoguide.com/california.shtml

2.	The pages that infringe our copyrighted work are:
http://www.knowyourcasino.com/california.php
http://american.onlinecasinosblogs.com/California_casinos.php?print=6
http://www.casino-magyck.com/usland-california.html
http://www.gamblingboard.com/cgi-bin/page.cgi?g=Land_Base_Casino%2FCalifornia%2Findex.html;d=l

3.	My name: [private]

4.	Contact information for the infringing web sites is not known to me.

5.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, at the law.

6.  I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive night that is allegedly infringed.
 
 
[private]
Casino Vacations
Publisher of American Casino Guide
